channel.title: Run server error
channel.description:
I get this when I try to run the server: [code][PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 46 packet handlers. [ClanManager] Loading clans.... [RS2Server] Loaded cache. [ClanManager] Loaded 3 clans. [AreaManager] Loading areas... com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.StreamException: : Unexpected end of file from serv er at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.DomDriver.createReader(DomDriver.java :88) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.DomDriver.createReader(DomDriver.java :70) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:845) at org.dementhium.io.XMLHandler.fromXML(XMLHandler.java:62) at org.dementhium.content.areas.AreaManager.<init>(AreaManager.java:20) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:98) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:68) at org.dementhium.RS2Server.main(RS2Server.java:46) Caused by: java.net.SocketException: Unexpected end of file from server at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.parseHTTPHeader(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.parseHTTP(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.parseHTTPHeader(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.parseHTTP(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLEntityManager.setupCurrent Entity(Unknown Source) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLEntityManager.startEntity( Unknown Source) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLEntityManager.startDTDEnti ty(Unknown Source) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDTDScannerImpl.setInputSou rce(Unknown Source) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDocumentScannerImpl$DTDDri ver.dispatch(Unknown Source) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDocumentScannerImpl$DTDDri ver.next(Unknown Source) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDocumentScannerImpl$Prolog Driver.next(Unknown Source) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDocumentScannerImpl.next(U nknown Source) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDocumentFragmentScannerImp l.scanDocument(Unknown Source) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(U nknown Source) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(U nknown Source) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.XMLParser.parse(Unknown So urce) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.DOMParser.parse(Unknown So urce) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.jaxp.DocumentBuilderImpl.parse(Unk nown Source) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.DomDriver.createReader(DomDriver.java :79) ... 7 more Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at org.dementhium.RS2Server.main(RS2Server.java:46) Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException at org.dementhium.content.areas.AreaManager.<init>(AreaManager.java:24) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:98) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:68) ... 1 more [/code]
I do 317 loading 600+ well,
but trying to experiment with this, being a 614

item.title: Run server error
item.dc:creator: @in_need_of_helps in need of helps
item.description:
